channel.title: static on My Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in static on My Hugo

item.title: Using Static and Shared Libraries Across Platforms
item.description: Using Static and Shared Libraries Across Platforms linker (ld) staticlly or dynamically hpux -a search whether shared or archive libraries are searched with -l option search=archive|shared|archive_shared|shared_archive|default pass to aCC -Wl,-a,archive -lmy_archive -Wl,-a,shared_archive -b create a shared library rather than a normal executable file osx -dylib produce a mach-o shared library with file type MH_DYLIB -search_dylibs_first tools ldd linux,solaris,hupx,aix otool osx otool -L file
